page.title: 01General Review west: FINTRY
page.content:
The area which people who live here think of as Fintry, covers 4 squares of this Domesday Survey. See also:
{ 02600687, 02600684, 02640684 { Only part of this area lies within the parish of{Fintry.}It is a hinterland merging into the parishes of{Balfron in the north and{Killearn}in the south and loyalties, and people's sense of place, vary accordingly.
Though an area of intensive dairy farming, the largest single employer is{Ballinkinrain School. { The{B 818}road is, in times of heavy snow the only way in, or out of the Fintry valley.
